sentences.en: Adults need to live their own lives and that's difficult with children.
sentences.cn: 大人需要过他们自己的生活，但有了孩子就很难做到了。

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: Fathers have the power to dominate children and young people.
sentences.cn: 父辈们有能力支配孩子们和年轻人的生活。

sentences.en: Having children was the quickest way to lose your street cred.
sentences.cn: 生孩子是使自己不再年轻时尚的最快方法。

sentences.en: He introduced radio to the school to increase the children's awareness.
sentences.cn: 他在学校开通广播，以提高孩子们的警觉性。

sentences.en: Like their children, parents are often defensive about their private lives.
sentences.cn: 就像子女一样，父母也常常很注重保护他们的私生活。

sentences.en: Many children are now born into or raised in one-parent families.
sentences.cn: 现在很多孩子在单亲家庭中出生或成长。

sentences.en: Mary Ann doesn't want to have children. Not right now, anyway.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安不想要孩子，至少现在不想。

sentences.en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
sentences.cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

sentences.en: She spends her Easter holidays taking groups of children to France.
sentences.cn: 她带领一群孩子去法国过复活节。

sentences.en: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
sentences.cn: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

sentences.en: The children are very tactile with warm, loving natures.
sentences.cn: 小孩子说话时喜欢用上热烈、表达喜爱的肢体触碰。

sentences.en: The children were waiting for placement in a foster care home.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子在抚育院等待安置。

sentences.en: They brought up their children to be God-fearing Christians.
sentences.cn: 他们将孩子培养成了虔诚的基督教徒。

sentences.en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentences.cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

phrases.tran_cn: 上帝之子（70年代一个基督教原教旨主义教派）
不幸儿童；生活条件差的儿童
孩子数目，儿童数量；子女人数

trans.tran_cn: 孩子们(child的复数)，儿童，膝下，孥
